name: LOST... (and Found)
description:
There has been a plane crash during a storm!
You must go and help any survivors that you
can find it on the local islands...
Please be careful though, these waters haven't been charted very well, so we aren't sure what's out there...
I'm sure you will be fine though! :) (probably...)
